title: So we're nerfing Shyvana due to her ability to power farm the jungle... Okay hear me out.
body:
Shyvana's win rates:

53.5% jungle.
46% top lane.

PBE changes: Burnout (W) damage lowered to 20/33/45/58/70 from 20/35/50/75/80

Okay now hear me out on this. This is going to be REALLY REALLY complicated (for Riot balance team members.) This might take all your concentration to follow.

Shyvana overpowered jungle. Shyvana underpowered lane. Shyvana burnout 20% bonus damage to jungle. No nerf Shyvana burnout damage to not jungle. Nerf Shyvana burnout damage to jungle. Shyvana no need 20% bonus damage to jungle.

I hope I didn't make this overly complicated.

replies.body: It is a love tap, man.

10 damage on a 7 second duration ability that also gives 25% of it's damage to melee attacks?

We're talking about removing over 100 damage from an ability. Love tap my asshole.

We can at least be happy that it wasn't a significant nerf to her starting jungle. They just need to tone down the on hit if it seems to be giving people trouble. 

I can promise you that this change is only in response to the devourer. It will again become a decent pick on her because she will greatly benefit from it and receive a huge power spike late game in combination with her Q. I have no doubt that her jungle win rate will go much higher when sated devourer update is live.

I think this is more in preparation for the new Sated Devourer.

Shyvana will be insane with the new Devourer, so it makes sense they want to address someone who will do so well with it before the new item comes out to avoid another WW fiasco.

And as it stands, coming from someone who's strongest jungle champion is Skarner/Shyvana, they're not exactly far off about her ability to powerfarm in the jungle, it is pretty insane and exactly why I love playing as her, its not unusual for me to come out level 18 when the next closest person is level 15 or 16. 

But I do see where you're coming from and have to agree, this is going to hurt lane shyvana already who is struggling, much more than a jungle shyvana.  Even with the nerfs, I'll still be clearing camps in 2 seconds.

They said with new item changes, they wouldn't go nerfing kits, which is the EXACT reason they gave when people mentioned Vlad would get incredibly out of hand with these new AP items. 

[This](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/gameplay-balance/uccGEFYE-better-nerf-vlad-before-the-ap-itemization-change-otherwise-hes-going-to-be-broken) is the exact post where he explains why they shouldn't nerf champions when releasing new items. It makes sense, but this just seems to be ridiculous since Master Yi who's getting the most out of the new item isn't being touched. Let's just say his passive and his Q's passive (CD reduc per AA) are both proc'able by the Phantom hit given by Sated, so 3 attacks turns into 6 on-hit procs. First 2 proc 1st phantom, which makes 3 hits so his next AA would have his passive which makes you strike twice, giving you a 2nd phantom, totaling 3 on-hit attacks in a single swing. This means with his usual BotRK+Devourer+other AS item like a Shiv, he has 2-2.5 AS with his R going, meaning he does 3 hits in about 1s. That's about 48% of current health. In 1s. They nerfed Eve's R, kept Elise's Q ratio low, and even made sure that Liandry's didn't proc an initial damage unlike all DoTs in the game to make sure people couldn't be shredded down by high amounts of current health. Seriously. >>
